scripts.build: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"` --build-arg VCS_REF=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` --build-arg VERSION=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` .
scripts.helm:package: helm package ./charts/shelfdb -d ./charts/dist && helm repo index --merge ./charts/dist/index.yaml ./charts/dist --url https://shelfdb.netlify.com
